TopicTitle: KSP Devs on Kurt J Mac's FLoBathon

Articles.Content:
Almost the whole Squad team and part of the forum community management joined Kurt for his Farlands or Bust'athon today and answered a lot of questions, and added things to the game live as the stream was going!

Livestream is over for the KSP devs now, turned out to be a really good livestream, lots of great information and pictures of KSP and great charity donations to Child's Play!

The KSP team says they'll be available for the other 2 livestreams Saturday and Sunday, so watch out for them!

http://www.twitch.tv/kurtjmac -For those who want to watch the coming livestreams.

I'll update this forum post of the KSP guys come on in the livestreams Saturday and Sunday if you don't follow Kurt.

Confirmed Venus, Mercury, Mars and Jupiter analog (if I remember correctly) and 5 moons. [fixed]

Confirmed new lava planet named "Charr" quote "for giggles!"

Kurt J Kermin with Kurt J Mac's 3D glasses are officially added to the game.

Nova's newly designed Kerbol (Kerbin sun)

Kurt J Kermin with 3D glasses model! First Kerbal to have a middle initial.

New Planet (Venus analog) Eve

http://www.twitch.tv/kurtjmac

Hope this is in the right spot on the forum, just wanted to let you guys know since they're answering a lot of questions.

Edited August 11, 2012 by Pingonaut
Lifestream is over, can someone recapitulate all questions and answers please?

Lifestream is over, can someone recapitulate all questions and answers please?

It's still going.

According to the stream voiced Kerbals will speak backwards Spanish. Sounds strangely fitting.

Edited August 10, 2012 by EleSigma
typo because my brain isn't working.
Oh, dat star. Kerbol looks beautiful and it demands that I get a craft as close to it as possible once the update sees release.

According to the stream voiced Kerbals will speak backwards Mexican. Sounds strangely fitting.

They said backwards Spanish, Russian, etc.

They also posted some more pictures of Nova's planets, one was a ship on a mars-like planet, one of a gas giant, but I didn't get them.

Those can be found here as well, though the gas giant will have some changes to it.

Unless the one posted there is the changed one...I haven't looked and I don't really care for streams that have thousands of people on it.
When I go to site, i see Minecraft goin on... I tough we are discussing KSP?:/

Nova actually does sound like Fry.

This is an interesting listen, thanks.

And that picture of the sun is amazing.

kurt is playing minecraft but they are discussing KSP

It's Farlands or Bust. The KSP devs are guest-speakers. Try turning on the sound.
The VOD will be on his channel once he restarts his stream: http://de.twitch.tv/kurtjmac/b/328128129

The VOD will be on his channel once he restarts his stream: http://de.twitch.tv/kurtjmac/b/328128129

BTW Spoot, Kurt is livestreaming for Child's Play charity, so it's a good thing that it has lots of people!

so i hear KSP may go on steam.

so i hear KSP may go on steam.

Yeah they said they've been in contact with Steam and it will be eventually available there.
What was it that Harv said about oxygen?

BTW Spoot, Kurt is livestreaming for Child's Play charity, so it's a good thing that it has lots of people!

A person like Kurt will have a lot of people watching their live streams regardless. Mind you, it's not the person streaming that I avoid, it's the traffic. I like being able to talk with the host and even 50 active viewers sending IMs on the chat would make that difficult.

And Steam...that's interesting. Greenlight if I'm not mistaken?

What was it that Harv said about oxygen?

He doesn't want to push people to have to deal with it.

@Spoot yeah I understand. I like to listen to them in the background, just to hear what they're talking about.
He said that he didn't really like the idea of having the added burden of dealing with oxygen.

He said that he didn't really like the idea of having the added burden of dealing with oxygen.

Does that also include food/other means of sustenance?
Eve looks awesome. I can't wait to go there. This game packs so much value for money it's ridiculous.
Added more: Eve planet and confirmed planet analogs.
And the lava planet is gonna be called Charr.

And the lava planet is gonna be called Charr.
